Out of the provided films, I'd highly recommend watching "Mystic River" and "It's a Wonderful Life".

In "Mystic River", directed by Clint Eastwood, the story revolves around three childhood friends whose lives intersect tragically when a 19-year-old girl is murdered. The cast includes notable actors such as Sean Penn, Kevin Bacon, and Tim Robbins.

On the other hand, "It's a Wonderful Life" is a classic film directed by Frank Capra that tells the heartwarming story of an angel helping a man to see how his life has impacted others and reveals to him what life would have been like if he had never existed. The movie stars James Stewart as George Bailey and Donna Reed as Mary Hatch Bailey.
